Name: Lycaon
Desc: Use it to obtain the Agent or unlock the Agent's Mindscapes.
Desc2:
Snapshots from Lycaon's daily life and from in combat, recording important moments before and after he became an Agent.
These images also provide insights into his fighting style and favorite weapons, helping to better understand his strengths.

Attached are the contact details for Victoria Housekeeping; the elegantly embossed silver signature on the card reveals the unmistakable hand behind it.
